name: ddclient
description: ddclient is a lightweight dynamic DNS update client written in Perl. It supports multiple DDNS providers to keep your domain pointing to your home server or dynamic IP, running as a CLI or daemon in server environments.

features.title: Dynamic Dns Updates
features.description: Keep domains pointing to changing IPs automatically. Always accessible

features.title: Multi
features.description: Works with dozens of DDNS services. Choose your preferred provider

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Minimal resource usage with Perl-based efficiency. Perfect for any server

features.title: Daemon Mode
features.description: Runs continuously in the background. Set and forget operation

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Ideal for self-hosted services with dynamic IPs. Reliable remote access

features.title: Battle
features.description: Mature, stable solution used for decades. Proven reliability
